plot: When Homer takes Ned to Las Vegas in an attempt to get him to loosen up, the two end up drunkenly marrying a pair of cocktail waitresses.

Homer is astonished to learn that Ned is sixty years old and,unusually, Ned admits that he wished he had done some more reckless things in his life so Homer takes him to Las Vegas. Here they both get extremely drunk and wake up to find that they have married cocktail waitresses Amber and Ginger. Eventually the two men are thrown out of Las Vegas and hitch a ride back to Springfield,Homer getting attacked by a vulture.—don @ minifie-1
